ygData.subject: Re: soulfire and twinking
ygData.msgSnippet: hehe sure any questions at all i can answer i will. Shada
ygData.messageBody:
hehe sure any questions at all i can answer i will.

Shada

> >

> to argue about

> opinion on it.
> i
> > have a paladin as a second character now, and yes i want
> the sword. is
> the
> > paladin twinked? yes, quite a bit. conventional argument
> is i worked
> damn
> > hard on my bard and if she can help my other character with
> items as well
> as
> > help her get the sword, then great (hey it's her in-game
> sister after
> all).
> > i can understand people not wanting every paladin on their
> server to have
> > it.
> >
> > i would very much like information on this quest and i know
> no one is
> > required to give it, but as of now i know absolutely
> nothing about it.
> >
> > sorry that sounds like ranting. i figured any questions
> about soulfire
> > would get this response but i asked anyway cause i'm

> at
